title: Balance Chiropractic - Huntington, NY
description: Specialties: We are a husband and wife team and have successfully helped our community since 2008. We offer a very unique approach to eliminate pain, restore proper function in the body and improve your overall health. We utilize drug-free, non-surgical approaches such as spinal decompression and class IV laser therapy which are FDA-cleared and proven by research to heal neck and low back conditions in addition to a variety of other muscle and joint related health conditions. We get to the root cause of the problem instead of treating just the symptoms. We also offer traditional chiropractic care, customized nutrition and weight loss programs, myofascial work, massage, custom orthotics, rehabilitation and physiotherapy and we see patients of all ages. Our focus is on quality of care over quantity and we treat of all our patients as we would our own family. Our environment is serene and calming, our team is friendly and accommodating and we take great pride in what we do as Chiropractic Physicians. Established in 2008. We opened up our NYC location, Balance Chiropractic & Rehabilitation back in 2005 and in 2008 branched out to Long Island where we wanted to raise a family and opened a second office, Balance Chiropractic & Wellness Center. Dr. Beberman graduated from Emory University and Palmer College of Chiropractic West and Dr. Deborah Genin graduated from Binghamton University and Palmer Collage of Chiropractic West. Both doctors grew up in Bayside, Queens and live local to Huntington and have two boys.
